item.title: My ailing father’s house burned down in the California fires. Will our brother, who took care of them, lose his inheritance?
item.description: “How can the insurance proceeds and legal settlement not be protected from our estranged sibling?”

item.title: How Warren Buffett went from picking horses to picking stocks — and what you can learn from it
item.description: Buffett’s sharp insights on racing odds would later help him build his Berkshire Hathaway billions.
